short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: track718 offers a real-time package trace to track your parcels worldwide.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TRACK718 is a one-stop global logistics track query platform. It solves the problem of ignorance of the transportation status of the goods in the process of cross-border transportation, and realizes efficient visual tracking.
  1. Free inquiry
2. TRACK718 supports global mainstream 1500+ transporter track query
3. The trajectory supports multilingual translation, and the package trajectory can be checked without barriers
4. Provide eleven standardized trajectory nodes, clear and standard trajectory status nodes, complete and accurate trajectory information, and help users manage the logistics nodes of all packages in real time
5. Free email push service: Unlimited emails can be sent, and push emails are automatically triggered according to changes in the status of the package, which is worry-free and effective.
